name: Protect My Boss
description:
The most challenging and fun game! Shield control is very easy but it's very hard to reach high scores!

Move your shield with one finger to protect your Boss. Clear your way as you reach higher and higher!

Protect your Boss with your shield while it's flying up! Beware of the obstacles.

Game Features:
- Free to play
- One finger control
- Different obstacles and experience every time
- Simple game play for relax
- No Ads

Challenge your friends for the highest score!
